data/wiki/graphics/tutorials/text-images.md

# Text & Images Learn how to render text and images on canvas. ## Basic Text `draw canvas [ font "Arial" 16 text "Hello, World!" 100 100 ]` ## Image Drawing `draw canvas [ image "logo.png" 100 100 image "sprite.png" 200 100 64 64 ]` ## Text with Styling `draw canvas [ font "Arial" 24 text-align 'center text "Centered Text" 200 100 ]` ## Image Scaling `draw canvas [ image "photo.jpg" 100 100 300 200 ]` ## See Also - [Text & Fonts](/wiki/graphics/text-fonts/) - Text reference - [Images](/wiki/graphics/images/) - Image reference
